item.title: June July August Hot Things
item.description: The wins and losses from Summer 2021 so far.

item.title: May Hot Things
item.description: May was a fast month with some milestones. Not only is the fog of the pandemic lifting and we’re able to move in the direction of normal again, there were some brand new additions to reality as I know it.

item.title: April Hot Things
item.description: So April 2021 has almost come to a close but here are the things asking for a fair bit of my attention this month. In no particular order.
